Will Sliney is an award winning and best selling comics artist and writer from Cork. He is currently the artist for Marvel\'s Spiderman 2099, and his graphic novel Celtic Warrior: The Legend of CÃº Chulainn, published by The O\'Brien Press in 2013, made the Irish Times bestseller list and is also the fastest selling graphic novel in Ireland.
